data.message:
so I went to California and found some battery operated ice cubes.  They were in a freezer located above a fridgerator.

I then located Ice Cube on a rag or glossy cover magazine of freeness availability.   Placed those onto squad cars within walking distance to the ocean of California.  

found a Constantine DVD.  relocated it.

sat on a bench.
visited a black gotto and we had a discussion without words.

B.S.  Live from Detroit It's the Wrecking ball taking out a entire stone structure I fell through in a vision I had whilst I was residing in a valley of minnesota.

anywho the moldy shmoldy mold spores floated up and hovered for a long while.   It's all gone now. That mold didn't sink into the dirt enough to be able to survive unless you build a bunch of 2 x 4 crapola which I don't see happening upon Detroit.

Stone is a real person.  

'He who casts the first stone'

you can't see he previous to a name
who is a question not a word in a sentence
casts:  movie or flick?
first stone

I do believe he is a Sullivan, Stone.

Louis and Tricia are home from the Raves and are done doing exstacy for 30 days.   That was during the days soon after Louis and I would walk uphill both ways to the LQ.

Louis and Tricia got my entire collection of Clive Barker horror Books, including all 5 Books of Blood.  At least one is Autographed from Clive himself from inside the Rosedale Mall located upon Saint Paul [the capitol of Minnesota].

There are the four gold plated [meaning the layer on the top of the piece of art is pure gold].  That is the Minnesota State Capitol structure.  It is made of pure stone.
